0392106b5412499256bd4bef08b2465a87d12635.request_summary: sys:You are roleplaying as an NPC ... | msg:The player character says to b... | tools:11

response.content: "Good day to you too, traveler! The inn's bustling as usual, though the night shift has been a bit rough with a group of ruffians causing a stir. As long as the ale keeps flowing, business stays steady."
